languages.text: "Но пусть не вовсем мы были друг с другом согласны, ты хотя бы попытал{mf|ся|ась} протянуть мне руку. В благодарность... Как и обещала, я поделюсь с тобой координатами схрона моих собратьев. И ты получишь награду, достойную твоих стараний".

"We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."
languages.original_text: "Но пусть не вовсем мы были друг с другом согласны, ты хотя бы попытал{mf|ся|ась} протянуть мне руку. В благодарность... Как и обещала, я поделюсь с тобой координатами схрона моих собратьев. И ты получишь награду, достойную твоих стараний".

traits.locale_text: "We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a courtesy, I will share the coordinates of my kinsmen's cache with you as promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

"We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a courtesy, I will share the coordinates of my kinsmen's cache with you as promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

"We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

"We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

"We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

languages.text: “或许我们并不会在所有事情上都达成共识，但你至少试图帮助过我。为了感谢你，我会像我承诺的那样，把我亲族藏匿宝藏的位置告诉你，你会得到与你的努力相称的奖赏。”
languages.original_text: "We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

traits.locale_text: “或许我们并不会在所有事情上都达成共识，但你至少试图帮助过我。为了感谢你，我会像我承诺的那样，把我亲族藏匿宝藏的位置告诉你，你会得到与你的努力相称的奖赏。”

languages.text: « Nous n'étions peut-être pas d'accord sur tout, mais vous avez au moins pris la peine de me tendre la main. Pour vous remercier, je vais vous communiquer les coordonnées de la cache de mon peuple, comme promis. Votre récompense sera à la hauteur de vos efforts. »
languages.original_text: "We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'étions peut-être pas d'accord sur tout, mais vous avez au moins pris la peine de me tendre la main. Pour vous remercier, je vais vous communiquer les coordonnées de la cache de mon peuple, comme promis. Votre récompense sera à la hauteur de vos efforts. »

languages.text: "Wir konnten wir uns nicht in allen Punkten einigen, aber immerhin habt Ihr probiert, mir die Hand auszustrecken. Zum Dank werde ich Euch wie versprochen die Koordinaten des Lagers meines Volks mitteilen. Dort werdet Ihr eine Belohnung finden, die Eure Mühen rechtfertigt."
languages.original_text: "We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

traits.locale_text: "Wir konnten wir uns nicht in allen Punkten einigen, aber immerhin habt Ihr probiert, mir die Hand auszustrecken. Zum Dank werde ich Euch wie versprochen die Koordinaten des Lagers meines Volks mitteilen. Dort werdet Ihr eine Belohnung finden, die Eure Mühen rechtfertigt."

languages.text: «Es verdad que no estábamos de acuerdo en todo, pero al menos intentó acercarse a mí. En señal de gratitud, le diré las coordenadas de nuestro alijo, como le prometí. Es una recompensa por todo lo que ha hecho».
languages.original_text: "We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

traits.locale_text: «Es verdad que no estábamos de acuerdo en todo, pero al menos intentó acercarse a mí. En señal de gratitud, le diré las coordenadas de nuestro alijo, como le prometí. Es una recompensa por todo lo que ha hecho».

languages.text: 「すべてにおいて合意したわけではないかもしれないが、少なくともあなたは我に手を差し伸べようとしてくれた。その礼として、約束通り、我が血族の隠し場所の座標を教えよう。あなたの努力に見合った報酬を与える」
languages.original_text: "We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."

traits.locale_text: 「すべてにおいて合意したわけではないかもしれないが、少なくともあなたは我に手を差し伸べようとしてくれた。その礼として、約束通り、我が血族の隠し場所の座標を教えよう。あなたの努力に見合った報酬を与える」

languages.text: "Her konuda aynı fikri paylaşmasak da en azından bana elini uzattın. Minnettarlığımı göstermek için söz verdiğim gibi soydaşlarımın zulasını bulabileceğin koordinatları sana vereceğim. Çabalarının karşılığını alacaksın."
languages.original_text: "We may not have agreed on everything, but at least you tried to reach out to me. As a thank you, I will share the coordinates of my kinspeople's cache with you as I promised. You will be given a reward worthy of your efforts."
